text: The National Police of Ecuador () is the national police force and it is the main civil law enforcement agency of Ecuador. They report to the Ministry of the Interior. Members of the police force have been accused of human rights abuses.2010 Human Rights Report: Ecuador, United States' Country Reports on Human Rights Practices Members of the National Police have been accused of murder, attempted murder, rape, extortion, kidnappings, and alien smuggling.2006 Human Rights Report on Ecuador, [United States' Country Reports on Human Rights Practices] ==References== Category:Ecuador
title: National Police of Ecuador
